Package io.nflow.rest.v1

Class ResourceBase

java.lang.Object
io.nflow.rest.v1.ResourceBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
JaxRsResource, SpringWebResource
public abstract class ResourceBase extends Object
Common base class for REST API logic
